name: Emitir
description:
You are Emit, a stranded robot on an alien world. You have found yourself marooned in a giant crater, with aliens lurking all around you waiting to destroy your only way out. Can you gather enough energy crystals and simultaniously keep up your defences?

Instructions

Due to the short time-frame we didn't implement a tutorial

  • AWSD/Left Joystick = Move
  • Arrows/Right Joystick = Digging
  • F/ A = Interact
  • Esc / B = Cancel

Towers

  • Q/ Left Bumper = Generator
  • E/ Right Bumper = Turret


Escape = Quit


Credits:

Programming: Jirre Verkerk
Art: Tim Schipper & Omar Bentaher
